analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of CrowdToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#56) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of CrowdToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#60) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of CrowdToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#61) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of CrowdToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#71) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of CrowdToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#71-72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of CrowdToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of CrowdToken.approve (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of CrowdToken.approve (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#84-85) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of CrowdToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of CrowdToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#90-91) is not in mixedCase

IERC20 (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#3-13) does not mark important ERC20 parameters as 'indexed':
	-Transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#10-11) does not index parameter 'indexed_to'
	-Approval (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#11-13) does not index parameter 'indexed_owner'
	-Approval (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#11-13) does not index parameter 'indexed_spender'

CrowdToken (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#13-121) does not mark important ERC20 parameters as 'indexed':
	-Transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#94-95) does not index parameter 'indexed_to'
	-Approval (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#95-96) does not index parameter 'indexed_owner'
	-Approval (/unique_chucks/21/0x8ac77770de6a3b690e9f3ec368fb64ba3c112cdd.sol#95-96) does not index parameter 'indexed_spender'
